
Consider the following statement as truth: {{Jang Bahadur Shukla (J.B. Shukla) is an Indian mathematician who specialised in mathematical modelling of ecological, environmental, physiological, and engineering systems.}}.
What is the most appropriate relation between {{Jang Bahadur Shukla}} and {{India}} from the following options?

{{located in}}
{{has population}}
{{has parent}}
{{from country}}
{{movie has director}}
{{won award}}
{{has genre}}
{{organization leader}}
{{is member of}}
{{first product}}
{{no relation}}
{{has occupation}}
{{has education}}
{{starring}}
{{birth place}}
{{has child}}
{{has type}}
{{organization has founder}}
{{headquarters}}
{{has sibling}}
{{event year}}
{{has author}}
{{has spouse}}
{{organization has member}}

Please choose the most suitable option from the given choices.
